name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, some netizens discovered that many big Vs such as Da Lan and Duan Cheng crazily recommended everyone to ALL IN A-shares during the National Day holiday, but after A-shares began to fall, these big Vs have hidden their previous videos.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: No memes, no innuendos! On October 11, Lianhe Zaobao quoted CCTV as saying that the Cyberspace Administration of China will launch a special campaign to rectify the problems of "black words and bad memes" and the abuse of obscure expressions on the Internet.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, a reporter searched and found that the financial blogger "Da Lan" with millions of followers was banned by the Douyin platform. At present, the homepage of "Da Lan"'s original account shows: "Due to violation of the relevant provisions of the Douyin Community Self-Discipline Convention, the account has been banned." According to Blue Whale Finance, "Da Lan"'s account page shows that it is a financial self-media, and the introduction does not show any securities industry related introduction, let alone securities investment consultant practice number and other content. Da Lan was a fitness coach in his early years. Previously, his account was once banned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the Financial Times published an article titled "Cut the leeks: Beijing triggers a retail stock market frenzy". The article mentioned that the surge in the Chinese stock market before the National Day attracted many small retail investors to plunge into the stock market. However, the violent fluctuations in the past two days have completely defeated many people. However, the article also said that the resurgence of the stock market is already obvious, and the total amount of funds flowing into the Chinese stock market will account for more than 350% of the current total market value of A shares. The sluggish real estate market and the "continued momentum of capital market reform" may promote the reconfiguration of household assets.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 11 (Released), Nanjing, Jiangsu. A man surnamed Tian was sentenced to ten months in prison for selling wild hair algae online. Tian runs two shops online, purchasing hair algae from other places for a long time and selling them in the name of original ecological local specialties. In less than two years, Tian illegally purchased 61.1 kilograms of wild hair algae, with sales exceeding 34,000 yuan. It is reported that hair algae, which is homophonic to "get rich", grows in plateau arid areas and is deeply loved by the Chinese people, so it is predatory. In order to strengthen protection, on September 7, 2021, hair algae was selected into the "National Key Protected Wild Plant List", with a protection level of Level I, and illegal collection and sale are prohibited.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 10, the Chinese Ambassador to Bangladesh met with the leaders of the Bangladeshi student movement and praised the courage and wisdom shown by the young generation of Bangladesh represented by them in the student movement.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the Norwegian Nobel Committee awarded the Nobel Peace Prize to the Japanese Council of Atomic and Hydrogen Bomb Victims in recognition of the organization's long-term efforts to achieve a world without nuclear weapons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, at 3 a.m. in Qingyuan, Guangdong, a netizen took a photo of two children picking up trash on the street.
